titles: The knitters jobb or The earnest suitor of Walton town to a fair maid, with her modest answers and conclusion of their intents : to the tune of Shackley hey.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby at the golden ball in West-Smithfield near the hospital gate,
notes: Verse: "VVithin the town of Walton fair ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
